ai-tika-abh01t2:48_3: Wearing to understand the states of excellence in one thing, one who is so skilled in the midst of the Dhamma’s going into the presence of another good thing,
ai-tika-abh01t2:48_4: for one who is able to discern the meaning.
ai-tika-abh01t2:48_5: The opposing of the dwellings, etc., is stopped at each other, and they use the place where there is none.
ai-tika-abh01t2:49_0: The commentary on the triple comment is finished.
